definition: Pan Yue (247-300), later known as 潘安[Pan1 An1], famous handsome and elegant writer from the Western Jin dynasty
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
surname Yue
wife's parents and paternal uncles

sentences.english: Pan Yue was one of the most important representative writers in the Western Jin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 潘岳是西晉文壇上具有代表性的作家。

sentences.english: Pan Yue is deputy director of China's State Environmental Protection Administration (SEPA).
sentences.chinese: 潘岳，中國國家環保總局副局長。

sentences.english: Pan Yue on the need for public participation on the environment.
sentences.chinese: 潘岳暢談公衆參與環保的必要性。
